committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to establish the Chimon Island National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Environment and Public Works with amendment, S. Rept. 98-646) Title I: To Establish the Connecticut Coastal National Wildlife Refuge - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Connecticut Coastal National Wildlife Refuge in Connecticut. Authorizes appropriations to the Department of the Interior for the acquisition of lands for the refuge. Title II: To Establish the Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge in Louisiana. Directs the Secretary to acquire lands, waters, or interests for the refuge with funds provided under the Second Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1984.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Chimon Island National Wildlife Refuge.
